Articles.Content:
How to get back to your lander, in style!

Edited December 14, 2013 by Kurtvw

He He, that's what I do. It's great when you time the slide just right, and it comes to an end just near your spacecraft. The trick is not accelerating to fatal speed..

BTW, what part of the Mun was that? It looks nice, I'd like to visit.

Yep! I killed a guy on Minmus like that! Those hills are deceptively steep.

That was filmed in the south end of East Farside Crater (according to the science 'East Farside Crater) which is a Biome I didn't even know existed. Anyhow, the crater has a very steep escarpment there, and thats what I was checking out.
